AD_GobletWithTadpoles.synopsis: A goblet with dead tadpoles in the secret room of Balthazar in Moonrise. Results of his experimenting probably

AD_GobletWithTadpoles_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_GobletWithTadpoles_0.text: *A goblet filled with the mutilated corpses of illithid parasites. Whatever ungodly experiments were performed on them likely killed them.*
